title: Claude Code 2.1 Released
description: Anthropic released Claude Code 2.1.0 with smoother workflows and smarter agents. Key new features include Skill Hot-Reloading for updating workflows without restarting, Session Teleportation for better session management, and improved infrastructure-level features for developers deploying structured workflows and reusable components. The release focuses on agentic architecture and workflow primitives with enhanced support for advanced workflows, hooks, and agents.

community_feedback.quote: Major Claude Code Updates - the 2.1 release is a game changer for agentic workflows
I tested all 16 new changes - the skill hot-reloading alone is worth the update

title: CLI Update (January 8, 2026)
description: Cursor released a major CLI update on January 8, 2026 featuring new CLI controls for models, MCP (Model Context Protocol) management capabilities, and new controls for rules and commands. The update also includes significant performance improvements with hooks now running 10-20x faster than before, along with various bug fixes and stability improvements.

community_feedback.quote: Hooks are now 10-20x faster - this is a massive performance improvement

title: Gemini 3 Flash Now Available
description: Windsurf added Gemini 3 Flash model availability for all users. The model combines Gemini 3 Pro-grade reasoning with Flash-level speed and efficiency, making it ideal for agentic workflows and coding tasks. Features include 3x faster performance than previous generations, superior coding intelligence outperforming Pro-tier models on key coding benchmarks (78% on SWE-bench Verified), and deep multimodal understanding for complex video, data extraction, and visual Q&A tasks.

title: Infosys Strategic Partnership
description: Cognition (Devin's creator) announced a wide-ranging strategic partnership with Infosys on January 9, 2026. The IT major will deploy Devin across its internal engineering ecosystem and global client engagements. This collaboration aims to scale AI software engineering capabilities across enterprises and includes integration with Infosys's Topaz Fabric. The partnership has sparked discussions about potential impacts on junior developer roles.

community_feedback.quote: Infosys to use AI coder Devin across company, sparks fear of job loss for freshers and junior developers
Major enterprise adoption signal - this validates Devin's approach to autonomous AI software engineering

title: Version 0.22 Released with Agent Skills Support
description: Gemini CLI released version 0.22 on January 2, 2026, featuring Gemini 3 series models opened to free users and new features including Conductor and Endor Labs integration. On January 9, 2026, Gemini CLI added Agent Skills support with 'on-demand loading' skill packages that can automatically adapt to team code standards, including functionality similar to Claude Code. Gemini 3 billing for Grounding with Google Search also began on January 5, 2026.

community_feedback.quote: Gemini 3 is now free - this democratizes access to powerful coding models

title: GPT-5.1-Codex-Max Introduction
description: OpenAI introduced GPT-5.1-Codex-Max, a new frontier agentic coding model built on an update to the foundational reasoning model trained on agentic tasks across software engineering, math, and research. The model delivers higher reliability, faster iteration, and support for long-running, project-scale workflows. The CLI and IDE Extension default to gpt-5.1-codex-max for users signed in with ChatGPT. The release also includes a new Extra High (xhigh) reasoning effort for non-latency-sensitive tasks, native Compaction support, expanded tool token limits up to 10,000, and Windows Agent mode with experimental sandbox.

community_feedback.quote: GPT-5.1-Codex-Max is a significant step towards becoming a reliable coding partner
